Texts.Chs: 一个最普通的开关。当它切换到/ON/会激活接入的节点。
Texts.Eng: A basic switch that can be used to activate something. It can even be toggled when its input node is /'on'/.

Texts.Chs: 一个用于激活节点的开关。切换为/ON/将会激活。
Texts.Eng: A switch. It activates something. It can even be toggled when its input node is /'on'/.

Texts.Chs: 真是太棒了，切换为/ON/时就可以激活接入的节点。
Texts.Eng: Flippin' awesome! Can even be toggled when its input node is /'on'/.

Texts.Chs: 我想知道这个开关可以打开和关闭多少次，无论是用手，还是当它的输入节点显示为/ON/时，我应该做什么？
Texts.Eng: How many times can I flip this switch on and off I wonder, either by hand, or when its input node is /'on'/?

Texts.Chs: 我可以按一下那里，就可以把它切换到/ON/状态！
Texts.Eng: I can flip this here switch, either by hand, or when its input node is /'on'/!

Texts.Chs: 开开开关! 我可以把它切换到/ON/状态。
Texts.Eng: Ssswitch! Can even be toggled when itsss input node isss /'on'/.

Texts.Chs: 这个开关虽然看上去挺小的，但它如果切换到/ON/时，就可以激活与其连接的设备了。
Texts.Eng: This small switch doesn't look that powerful, but I can toggle it either by hand, or when its input node is /'on'/.

Texts.Chs: 这个开关必须激活某些东西。我还可以看到，当它的输入节点是/ON/。
Texts.Eng: This switch must activate something. I can also see that it can be toggled when its input node is /'on'/.
